title: Neo-Classik Comix: Adventures on 27th Street
text: Mark Beard is an acclaimed set designer, mural painter, photographer, and sculptor who's also produced sixteen artist's books to date. The scenarios in Neo-Classik Comix represent events Beard experienced in a month in New York-house guests, a gallery opening, an encounter with the IRS. He manipulated the inking of each engraving using Q-Tips and cotton balls, and hand-wrote all the captions.
description: small two page sections with five or six horizontal square images; last section has fold-out horizontal and vertical larger images; hand-written red ink captions; sixty-five images; green cover; orange box
